  • Method Details

    • setRouteesNum

      public ReActorServiceConfig.Builder setRouteesNum​(int routeesNum)
      A Service exposes the behavior of a reactor in a resilient and load balanced manneer. Here we specify how many instances of the exposed reactor should be automatically created and mantained by the router.
      Parameters:
      routeesNum - number of instances of the exposed reactor that should be created/mantained

    • setRouteeProvider

      public ReActorServiceConfig.Builder setRouteeProvider​(UnChecked.CheckedSupplier<ReActor> routeeProvider)
      On request, the service may need to dynamically spawn a new routee. This provider is their factory
      Parameters:
      routeeProvider - Used to spawn a new routee reactor on request

    • setSelectionPolicy

      public ReActorServiceConfig.Builder setSelectionPolicy​(ReActorService.LoadBalancingPolicy loadBalancingPolicy)
      A service automatically load balances messages to its routees. Here we define how that should be done
      Parameters:
      loadBalancingPolicy - Policy to use for selecting the destination among routee when a message when a message for a routee is received by the service

    • build

      public ReActorServiceConfig build()
      Specified by:
      build in class ReActiveEntityConfig.Builder<ReActorServiceConfig,​ReActorServiceConfig.Builder>
